attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in the Government
attributes.additional_details: We think that the Government will harm the British economy with their Budget and everyone will be worse off. We are also concerned that they will harm British family farms with their tax changes.
attributes.background: We want a vote of no confidence in the Labour Government and then an immediate General Election if they lose.

rejection.details:
Apologies - this petition was published in error, and has now been removed as an open petition.  We are sorry for the confusion.

We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help
 
If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
